titleStmt.title: The delectable history of Poor Robin the merry sadler of Walden Shewing many merry passages of his life, of harmless mirth, to lengthen delight, and frive away melancholly
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers, bookseller, at the sign of the black Raven in Fetter-Lane, near Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Winstanley.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Copy has the word "delectable" crossed out on the title page and the word "damnable" written above it.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
